subject: Football
Bowl Games
lead_paragraph: In June, U.S.C. was hit with sanctions that prevented it from playing in bowl games and leaving the upperclassmen who refused to transfer with an all-for-one mentality.
snippet: In June, U.S.C. was hit with sanctions that prevented it from playing in bowl games and leaving the upperclassmen who refused to transfer with an all-for-one mentality.
